name: White Disc Chest
description: Kafra' s latest service technology, which allows for random access of valuable records.

name: White Dog Equip
description: An exquisite bow tie made of smooth silk. It's comfortable to wear.

name: White Dyestuffs
description: A magic potion to dye the hair white.

name: White Flower Katar
description: Inlaid with a platinum blade, This sword looks like white flowers in bloom. Therefore, it is known as the White Flower Katar.

name: White Flower Katar [2]
description: Inlaid with a platinum blade, This sword looks like white flowers in bloom. Therefore, it is known as the White Flower Katar.

name: White Herb
description: A raw material for producing white hair dyes.

name: White Love Gift Box
description: Encounters between people are decided by fate. Chances just come and go. Open the present with the one you value most! (Open it and you will get a (Lover Whisper) as well as an item randomly selected among Seed of Mastela, Chef's Eagle Eye, Adventure Meatball, Dish Pack B, Royal Jelly, Candy and Praying Card Pack.)

name: White Love Gift Set
description: A gift set exclusively for this early spring season of love. Share the joy with your dear friends in the warm breeze. (Open to obtain 10 Mora Coins and a random amount of Zeny between one million and two million)

name: White Love Song Gift Set
description: The White Valentine's Gift Set Special Edition can be used to exchanged for the Love of Heart (male) or the Sakura of Love (female) beauty contact lens!  Use it and get the lens from the Beauty of Eyes in Prontera.

name: White Paper
description: A piece of white paper giving of dim and gentle light. May be you can write something special on it.

name: White Potion
description: Potion made from crushed white herbs. Use it to restore 385-450 points of HP.

name: White True Love Chocolate
description: The white chocolate symbolizing love and purity, it must be made of special materials and the blessing of God of Love from Big Cat planet. Due to the specialty, it can only be sent to the most special person! (Choose the one you love, bravely give it to her/him! Effects: Use it on other adventures, granting them the perfume's effect and restoring 520 HP every 30 seconds. The effect lasts for 12 hours, and will not be affected by death or going offline. Does not stack. )

name: White Winged Boots
description: Boots designed after the legendary Hermes sandals. With small wings, they can make the wearer pace particularly brisk. "Don't think about it. If you can fly casually in winged boots, what is the airship for?- by Ship Captain
effect: Move Spd ＋10%, Critical ＋2 and Crit.Dmg ＋2% at Refinement ＋10, Critical ＋6 and Crit.Dmg ＋6% at Refinement ＋15

name: White Winged Boots [1]
description: Boots designed after the legendary Hermes sandals. With small wings, they can make the wearer pace particularly brisk. "Don't think about it. If you can fly casually in winged boots, what is the airship for?- by Ship Captain
effect: Move Spd ＋10%, Critical ＋2 and Crit.Dmg ＋2% at Refinement ＋10, Critical ＋6 and Crit.Dmg ＋6% at Refinement ＋15

name: Wide Dagger
description: A multi-function Knife made for practical purpose.

name: Wide Dagger [2]
description: A multi-function Knife made for practical purpose.
